def detect_faces(self): """ Detects faces in the image.
:return: The list of faces found in the image. """ try: response = self.rekognition_client.detect_faces( Image=self.image, Attributes=['ALL']) faces = [RekognitionFace(face) for face in response['FaceDetails']] logger.info("Detected %s faces.", len(faces)) except ClientError: logger.exception("Couldn't detect faces in %s.", self.image_name) raise else: return faces
